about_the_game:
Celtic Book

This Celtic-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Patterns, traditions and so much more!

Explore the history of the Celtic people with this historical pack!

Contents

The Celtic book unlocks the following images:
  • Triskele - 37x38
  • Five Fold Symbol - 40x40
  • Mindeheim - 45x178
  • Bagpiper - 52x97
  • Bronze Shield - 60x124
  • Brooch - 75x41
  • Stained Glass - 76x195
  • Torc - 80x65
  • Fáinne - 84x85
  • Trinity Knot - 110x107
  • Llanddwyn Island - 125x185
  • Shamrock - 132x132
  • Tree of Life - 132x132
  • Irish Flute - 137x74
  • Kilchurn Castle - 150x90
  • The Burren - 152x97
  • Tartan - 161x147
  • Roundhouse - 170x75
  • Cliffs of Moher - 192x122
  • Celtic Landscape - 220x150

Celtic Book

This Celtic-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Patterns, traditions and so much more!

Explore the history of the Celtic people with this historical pack!

Contents

The Celtic book unlocks the following images:
  • Triskele - 37x38
  • Five Fold Symbol - 40x40
  • Mindeheim - 45x178

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Celtic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
